name: blog_multi_format_generator
description: Transform blog post into multiple social formats. Params: {blog_url, target_platforms[]}

nodes.instruction:
Fetch and analyze blog post from: {blog_url}

Extract:
- Main thesis/argument
- Key points (5-7)
- Target audience
- Tone and style
- Notable quotes
- Call-to-action

Create Twitter/X thread (10-15 tweets) from blog:
{fetch_blog}

Rules:
- First tweet: Attention-grabbing hook
- Each tweet: max 280 chars
- Use emojis strategically
- Include 1-2 hashtags per tweet
- End with CTA linking to blog
- Maintain narrative flow

Format: Number each tweet (1/15, 2/15, etc.)

Create LinkedIn post from blog:
{fetch_blog}

Rules:
- Professional tone
- 1300-2000 characters
- Hook in first 2 lines
- 3-5 relevant hashtags
- Include question for engagement
- Link to blog at end
- Professional formatting (line breaks, bullets)

Format: Ready-to-publish LinkedIn post.

Create Instagram carousel content (8-10 slides) from blog:
{fetch_blog}

For each slide provide:
- Slide number
- Main text (short, visual-friendly)
- Image description/suggestion
- Design notes

Rules:
- Slide 1: Eye-catching title
- Slides 2-9: One key point per slide
- Slide 10: CTA with link in bio
- Keep text minimal (Instagram is visual)

Create YouTube video script (5-7 minutes) from blog:
{fetch_blog}

Structure:
- INTRO (0:00-0:30): Hook + what viewer will learn
- MAIN CONTENT (0:30-6:00): Key points with examples
- OUTRO (6:00-7:00): Summary + CTA

Include:
- Timestamps
- B-roll suggestions
- On-screen text suggestions
- Links to include in description

Create email newsletter snippet from blog:
{fetch_blog}

Format:
- Subject line (compelling, 50 chars)
- Preview text (100 chars)
- Email body (300-400 words)
- Highlight key insight
- CTA button text
- P.S. line

Tone: Conversational but professional.

Compile comprehensive multi-platform content package:

# Content Repurposing Package

## Original Blog
{fetch_blog}

## Twitter/X Thread
{create_twitter_thread}

## LinkedIn Post
{create_linkedin_post}

## Instagram Carousel
{create_instagram_carousel}

## YouTube Script
{create_youtube_script}

## Newsletter Snippet
{create_newsletter_snippet}

---

## Publishing Schedule Suggestion
- Day 1: LinkedIn + Newsletter
- Day 2: Twitter thread
- Day 3: Instagram carousel
- Day 4: YouTube video

## Hashtag Strategy
[Compile all hashtags used across platforms]

## Performance Tracking
[Suggest metrics to track for each platform]
